word_mean: 间皮瘤：来自间皮组织，包括腹膜、胸膜及心包的恶性肿瘤，呈宽的细胞层，某些部位有梭形细胞、肉瘤样细胞，而其他部位呈腺瘤型。胸膜间皮瘤与接触石棉有关

sentence.Network_en: Peritoneal mesothelioma refers to primary peritoneal mesothelial cells in the tumor.
sentence.Network_cn: 腹膜间皮瘤是指原发于腹膜间皮细胞的肿瘤.

sentence.Network_en: A bronchoscopy may be performed if pleural mesothelioma is suspected.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果怀疑胸膜间皮瘤,也可用支气管镜检查.

sentence.Network_en: However, it more amenable to treatment than mesothelioma is.
sentence.Network_cn: 然而, 它对治疗比间皮瘤敏感.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 间皮瘤（mesothelioma）：从位于腹膜或肋膜上的间皮细胞转变的肿瘤。 　　神经胶质瘤（glioma）：由神经胶质细胞变化成肿瘤，神经 …

2008年4月24日 - 腹膜间皮瘤(peritoneal mesothelioma) 为原发于腹膜上皮和间皮组织的肿瘤,临床很少见。病理上可将之分为腺瘤样间皮瘤(adenomatoid mesothelioma)、囊性间皮.

means.word_mean: 1. a rare form of carcinoma of the mesothelium lining lungs or abdomen or heart; usually associated with exposure to asbestos dust

auth_sentence.content: Pets also played an important role in drawing a link between asbestos and mesothelioma.
